name: Slotzee Connect
description:
Welcome to Slotzee Connect! 

Made in just one week for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022, Slotzee Connect is a game about Connection.

Help birds connect with each other by connecting numbered dice from one end of the board to the other. Each round consists of 3 spins and 2 hold phases. Spin the slots, then click on the dice you would like to keep for the remaining of the round. Your final score is calculated after 10 rounds.

As you play, you will see each pair of birds you connect fly around together in the background. The more connections you make, the more alive the scene becomes!

Slotzee is a game of chance at it's core, but YOU have the ability to tip the odds in your favor! Sit back, relax, and enjoy the vibe.

I hope you have as much fun playing it as I had making it!
